title: The King's life guard
creator_credit: Muir Mathieson, Alexander Shaw and Realist Films
brief_description: The ceremony of the Changing of the Guard. Shows the preparation of the household cavalry at the Royal barracks and stables followed by the procession and finally the actual ceremony.
creator_credit_for_label: Muir Mathieson, Alexander Shaw and Realist Films
